sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>building</radical> has a <radical>roof</radical> and will teach you about the <radical>origin</radical> of many things. It's an <kanji>institution</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Institutions are places of learning, but they have to be a physical place with a roof and all that. If you're learning out in a field somewhere, that's probably not a proper institution.
readingMnemonic: What does <kanji>institution</kanji> start with? In (<ja>いん</ja>)!
readingInfo: Just remember, it's an IN-stitution, and you'll know this reading easy-peasy.
